featured.text: As of May 1, 1995, all nationals of the following 15 countries are exempted from securing visas for entry into the Republic of China: U.S.A., Japan, Canada, Belgium, Luxembourg, Sweden, Holland, New Zealand, Australia, Austria, Germany, Britain, France, Spain, and Portugal.
The Europeans brought wetas to New Zealand. 43.

definition.zh_def: 新西蘭的地名，通常指新西蘭這個國家或其主要島嶼之一。
definition.en_def: A geographical term referring to New Zealand or one of its main islands.
definition.example: Zealand is known for its stunning landscapes and diverse wildlife.
